data.meta_description: Buddies is a Podcast with Comedian Frank Castillo & JP, two avid stoners that educate listeners every week as they take a deep dive into weed culture, Cannabis and Comedy. With a mix of fun segments, they will educate listeners about legislation, whoâs growing best weed on the market, and interviewâ¦
data.text:
Pack that bowl and sit back because Franks about to get roasted. The boys sit down with Writer, Comedian, Paid Regular, Jerron Horton. Jerron has written on all the dope Tv show, the Roasts and a murder onstage. He is also one of franks oldest friends, they have shared countless memories working at the comedy store and going on the road, and he was in franks wedding! JP met Jerron through the comedy store and the countless smoke sessions in sacred ground where Jerron is arguably the most consistent killer in the smoke circle. This episode is no different, We talk Franks wedding, The PS5, and The High Rise Decor! Â

LIKE AND SUBSCRIBE! ITUNES SPOTIFY ANCHORFMÂ

subscribe to get episodes early! and also get a big joint with your name on it! Â

Social Media! IG:@buddies.podcast Â Frank Castillo Twitter: @frankccomedy IG: @frankcastillo Â JP IG: @JP_Noda

That New New for you to roll up and listen too! Today the boys have two legends in the Weed industry, Bobby McGowan & Justin Capri, Co Founders of Cannacraft. They are killing the game, they have multiple lines on the market, Hifi Hops, ABX Vapes, Concentrates, Care By Design and now their new flower line The Farmer and The Felon. A fantastic flower line that also partnered up with The Last Prisoner Project a group fighting to help reform Cannabis Laws and get people out of jail for weed related crimes. Frank and the guys go back to when he was just a door guy that would sneak into the back of Sam Tripoli's Comedy Chaos shows to do dabs with the guys, Jp knows them through working at Buds and Roses and the comedy store, so this episode we really have a lot of fun.Â

This episode we talk BJJ, Moving to texas, The Comedy Store highs, and the future of the industry. Â

SMOKE:

Wedding Pie by Ember Valley - Wedding Cake x Grape Pie.

Tasting notes: sweet grape and gasoline

Another hot episode for you to pack in your bowl and smoke. This week we have Jarobi White & Chris Riggins. They both stop by to tell the boys about the new project they are working on called "Dope Dinners", A intimate show mixing, comedy music and weed! Jarobi is not only an amazing musician, but a phenomenal chef, Chris is one of franks friends and amazing comic from the Bay Area.Â

JP rolls us some fire and we celebrate the shows first sponsor! Friendly Farms! This episode we cover, Internet porn, Chappelles Summer Camp, and Chris's Fathers Nipples. Â

Tasting notes: earthy with a cookies funk, just a kiss of mint on the end. Â Â

Rolls Choice - by farmer and the Felon Â Chem dog x og kush Terps: og kush gas all day. A little chem on the end. Â Â

BlueberryDiesel by - humboldts finest Â Blueberry x NYSour Diesel Â

Terps: sweet stone fruit with a Â slight diesel gasoline finish

This episode it out of this world, the boys sit down with THE MASTER ARTIST, THE ART GOD HIMSELF, Jason Lee. The boys met The Master Artist at HighRiseTv's BASECAMP, instantly hit it off. He showed them his wild art and told them his wild origin story, so we had to have him on the podcast. Starting off in Commercial advertising, one of his first accounts was working on the new Microsoft Project that would become the XBOX 360. He designed a skin that you could buy for your xbox avatar, which is how most of these major AAA game studios now make all their money off of, Skins. After his design made 1 Milliion dollars for Microsoft he decided it was time to go on his own and become a "Fine artist". its an amazing story and Jp absolutely breaks Frank with dabs. Â

Silver Cloud by A Golden State - A proprietary genetic, reminiscent of a Gelato is usually a cross of Sunset sherbet x Thin Mint Cookies Sweet sherbet (strain) and potent diesel gas finish Â

Â Grape Pie @pffn.co - Cherry Pie x Grape Stomper Â Terps: Freshly made grape jelly

This week JP and Frank sit down with two very funny friends and comedians, Sara Weinshenk and Rachel Wolfson! Frank has know these two for a very long time, Frank and Sara came up together at the Store when they first moved to LA. Frank met Wolfie a few years ago when she started stand up, she has quickly made a name for herself in comedy and the weed industry.Â

JP has smoked in the back with both of them countless times and followed their journeys through podcasts. But today we get super baked and talk about, being fat kids growing up, worst bombs, being drunk at the comedy store, and stalking childhood crushes! Â

This was a really fun one to record. The boys sit down with Felipe Esparza! a very very funny comedian and a favorite of Franks Mother. They boys start off with bong rips and dabs to the face, the boys talk Vietnam, Tagging Sadam's Chair, The Comedy Store and Felipe tells us about the new season of the Eric Andre Show! Check out Felipes Netflix specials he shot 2! one in English and one in Spanish! " BAD DECISIONS" Â

15 gram cannon. 14 grams of double blue dream by humboldts finest and 1 gram of cured gelato33 resin processed by friendly farms. Â
